page.title: 12Kirby Muxloe Primary School
page.content: Two hundred and twenty seven children go to Kirby Muxloe Primary Sch and there are twelve teachers:- Mrs Fearn,Miss Smith,Mrs Harding,Mrs Hassell,Mrs Glover,Mrs Watts,Mrs Hicklin,Mr Bodicoat,Mr Cooper,Mr Barnes,Mrs Wood and Mrs Weir.There are two people who help Mr Barnes to count the money- Mrs Meadows and Mrs Blunt.There are also 2 helpers called Mrs Carpenter and Mrs Blunt.Three ladies cook the dinners, there are 5 dinner ladies,Mrs Harvey the caretaker an two cleaners. The P.F.A.raise a lot of money for the school and they built our swimming pool.It is 12.5m long and 5m wide.The old school bell is in the foyer.It says John Taylor and Co.,Founders, Loughborough, 1909 on it.The old part of the school was built in 1910. {
